original_text: And the men which were expressed by name rose up, and took the captives, and with the spoil clothed all that were naked among them, and arrayed them, and shod them, and gave them to eat and to drink, and anointed them, and carried all the feeble of them upon asses, and brought them to Jericho, the city of palm trees, to their brethren: then they returned to Samaria.
korean_text: 이 위에 이름이 기록된 자들이 일어나서 포로를 맞고 노략하여 온 것 중에서 옷을 가져다가 벗은 자들에게 입히며 신을 신기며 먹이고 마시게 하며 기름을 바르고 그 약한 자들은 모두 나귀에 태워 데리고 종려나무 성 여리고에 이르러 그의 형제에게 돌려준 후에 사마리아로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And the men which were expressed by name rose up,
and with the spoil clothed all that were naked among them,
sentences.korean_translation: 노략물로 그들 중 벗은 자들을 모두 입히고,

sentences.original_text: and gave them to eat and to drink,
and carried all the feeble of them upon asses,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 약한 자들을 모두 나귀에 태우고,
